synopsis.text: Nude Rouge lipstick takes center stage in this captivating commercial featuring the enigmatic Rei Ayanami from Neon Genesis Evangelion. As she prepares for an intriguing encounter, Rei breaks free from conventions and boldly declares, "no more rules." This collaboration between the anime series and KATE TOKYO highlights their 2-toned, cream lipstick palette, inviting viewers to embrace their own unique beauty. The commercial exists in two versions, offering fans a deeper look into Rei's first experience with lipstick.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
